TEXT.English: Build this low powered melee combat unit to provide your army with quick response defensive units.
TEXT.French: Produisez cette unité peu puissante de combat rapproché pour fournir rapidement à votre armée des unités défensives.
TEXT.German: Mit diesen ansonsten eher schwachen Nahkampfeinheiten stellen Sie Ihren Truppen Defensivkämpfer für schnelle Gegenangriffe zur Seite.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci questa unità da combattimento in mischia poco potente per integrare il tuo esercito con unità di difesa a risposta rapida.
TEXT.Spanish: Construye esta unidad de combate cuerpo a cuerpo, poco poderosa, para dotar a tu ejército con unidades defensivas de respuesta rápida.

TEXT.English: This mounted unit is very powerful for early in the game and is a great counter to an enemy with catapults.
TEXT.French: Cette unité montée est particulièrement efficace dans les premières phases du jeu et s'avère très utile face à un ennemi disposant de catapultes.
TEXT.German: Diese berittene Einheit ist in den frühen Phasen des Spiels sehr effizient und eignet sich hervorragend für Angriffe auf feindliche Katapulte.
TEXT.Italian: Questa unità montante è molto potente nelle prime fasi della partita ed è ottima per contrastare le catapulte nemiche.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad montada es muy poderosa al principio del juego, y sirve para contrarrestar a un enemigo que disponga de catapultas.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Peltasts[COLOR_REVERT] are cheap units, useful for reinforcing tactical locations such as hills and forests.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Peltastes[COLOR_REVERT] sont des unités bon marché, utiles pour renforcer des positions tactiques, comme des collines ou des forêts.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Peltasten[COLOR_REVERT] sind kostengünstige Einheiten, die sich zur Sicherung taktischer Standorte, beispielsweise in Hügeln oder Wäldern, eignen.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]peltasti[COLOR_REVERT] sono unità poco costose, utili per rinforzare la difesa di punti strategici come colline e foreste.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Peltastas[COLOR_REVERT] son unidades baratas, útiles para reforzar los lugares tácticos, como colinas y bosques.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Prodromoi[COLOR_REVERT] are good scouting units. They are lightly armored and extremely fast.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]prodromoi[COLOR_REVERT] sont de bons éclaireurs. Ils portent des protections légères et sont extrêmement rapides.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Prodromoi[COLOR_REVERT] sind gute Aufklärungseinheiten. Sie sind leicht gepanzert und bewegen sich extrem schnell.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]prodromoi[COLOR_REVERT] sono delle buone unità di esplorazione. Hanno una corazza leggera e si muovono molto velocemente.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Prodromoi[COLOR_REVERT] son buenas unidades de batidores. Van con armaduras ligeras y son muy rápidos.
[ICON_BULLET]Se cura a la vez que se mueve

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No Combat Penalty for Attacking from Sea
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Aucune pénalité de combat en attaquant depuis la mer
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessuna penalità di combattimento quando si attacca dal mare
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No sufre penalización al combate por atacar desde el mar

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Permette di attaccare più volte durante lo stesso turno
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_DmgChange%% di danno da bombardamento sulla città

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut se déplacer sur les routes ennemies

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] probabilità di fuga di indennità di %d1_percent%%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] ocasión del escape de la prima del %d1_percent%%

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] indennità di evasione di rilevazione di %d1_percent%%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] prima de la evasión de la detección del %d1_percent%%

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_Num possibilità di [NUM1:'Attacco improvviso supplementare':'Attacchi improvvisi supplementari']
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Probabilidad de %d1_Num [NUM1:ataque de iniciativa adicional:ataques de iniciativa adicionales]
[ICON_BULLET]%d1_Num [NUM1:ataque de iniciativa adicional:ataques de iniciativa adicionales]

TEXT.French: Dirigé par un seigneur de guerre
TEXT.Spanish: Bajo el liderato de un Caudillo

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Soigne les unités dans les cases adjacentes de + %d1_Heals%%[SPACE]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Heilt Einheiten auf benachbarten Geländefeldern um zusätzliche %d1_Heals%%[SPACE]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Cura le unità nelle caselle adiacenti del %d1_Heals%%[SPACE]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Cura a las unidades en casillas adyacentes un %d1_Amount%% más de[SPACE]

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Soigne les unités dans la même case de + %d1_Amount%%[SPACE]
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Heilt Einheiten auf demselben Geländefeld um zusätzliche %d1_Amount%%[SPACE]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Cura le unità nella stessa casella del %d1_Amount%%[SPACE]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Cura a las unidades en la misma casilla un %d1_Amount%% más de[SPACE]

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Capacité de mouvement doublée dans les collines
[ICON_BULLET] révolte de ville de bonification de %d1_percent%% des missions
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] sommossa della città di indennità di %d1_percent%% dalle missioni
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] rebelión de la ciudad de la prima del %d1_percent%% de misiones

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] malaise de bonification de %d1_percent%% des missions
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] agitazione di indennità di %d1_percent%% dalle missioni
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] malestar de la prima del %d1_percent%% de misiones

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] bonification ennemie de détection d'espion de %d1_percent%%
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] indennità nemica di rilevazione della spia di %d1_percent%%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] prima enemiga de la detección del espía del %d1_percent%%

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] bonification de %d1_percent%% aux missions de contre- espionnage
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] indennità di %d1_percent%% alle missioni di contro spionaggio
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] prima del %d1_percent%% a las misiones del espionaje contrario

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Wird im Austausch für %D1_percent%% [ICON_STRENGTH] im Gefecht geopfert
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Se sacrifica en combate a cambio de un %D1_percent%% de [ICON_STRENGTH]
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Discount al coste del movimiento por terreno

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] maladie de bonification de %d1_percent%% des missions
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] malattia di indennità di %d1_percent%% dalle missioni
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] enfermedad de la prima del %d1_percent%% de misiones

TEXT.English: Do you wish to give this unit a title?
TEXT.French: Voulez-vous donner un titre à cette unité ?
TEXT.German: Wollt Ihr dieser Einheit einen Titel verleihen?
TEXT.Italian: Vuoi dare un nome a questa unità?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Queréis darle un título a esta unidad?

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Crée des retombées radioactives sur des améliorations sabotées.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] Genera la precipitazione radioattiva sui miglioramenti sabotati.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Crea el polvillo radiactivo en mejoras saboteadas.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Ville de garnison : probabilité de révolte réduite de %d1_percent%%
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_percent%% geringeres Risiko für Revolten in verschanzter Stadt
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Città con guarnigione: probabilità di rivolta %d1_percent%% in meno
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Ciudad con guarnición: %d1_percent%% menos proclive a rebelarse

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Aucune pénalité de combat en franchissant une rivière
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessuna penalità nel guado di un fiume
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No sufre penalización al combate por cruzar un río
[ICON_BULLET] prima libre de la preparación del %d1_percent%%
Cuando se agrega a una unidad:

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Strike Enemy Units (-8%/Turn)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Maximum 20% damage to enemy on attack
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Airships[COLOR_REVERT] can perform air strikes, perform recon missions and see the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] units.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Minuteman[COLOR_REVERT], the American replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.

Spanish.Text: SEAL de la Marina:SEAL de la Marina

TEXT.English: This powerful modern infantry unit (the American replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Marine[COLOR_REVERT]) gets a bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Guns[COLOR_REVERT]. It starts with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.French: Cette puissante unité d'infanterie moderne (unité américaine qui vient remplacer les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]marines[COLOR_REVERT]) bénéficie d'un bonus contre l'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]artillerie[COLOR_REVERT] et les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]mitrailleuses[COLOR_REVERT]. Elle dispose des promotions [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibie[COLOR_REVERT] et [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marche[COLOR_REVERT] dès le départ.
TEXT.German: Diese moderne Infanterie-Einheit (die amerikanische Version des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Marines[COLOR_REVERT]) hat im Kampf gegen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillerie[COLOR_REVERT]geschütze und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Maschinengewehre[COLOR_REVERT] einen Bonus. Startet mit den Beförderungen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibisch[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marschieren[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Questa potente unità di fanteria moderna (l'equivalente americano del [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Marine[COLOR_REVERT]) ha un bonus contro [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artiglieria[COLOR_REVERT] e [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mitragliatori[COLOR_REVERT]. Parte con le promozioni [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]anfibio[COLOR_REVERT] e [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marcia[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Esta poderosa unidad de infantería moderna (que reemplaza al [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Marine[COLOR_REVERT] en la civilización estadounidense) obtiene una bonificación contra la [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillería[COLOR_REVERT] y las [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ametralladoras[COLOR_REVERT]. Empieza con los ascensos de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Anfibia[COLOR_REVERT] y [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marcha[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]animaux[COLOR_REVERT] attaquent les colons sans protection. Prenez garde !
TEXT.Italian: Gli [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]animali[COLOR_REVERT] attaccano i coloni senza scorta! Fai attenzione!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Animales[COLOR_REVERT] dan caza a los colonos desprotegidos! ¡Tened cuidado!

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Camel Archer[COLOR_REVERT], the Arabian replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Archery[COLOR_REVERT] technologies, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Guilds[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horse[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resources, is able to withdraw from combat and has double movement in Desert.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archers[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike, have a defensive bonus in cities and have a defensive bonus in hills.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadier Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT], the Argentine replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT], loses the flank bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT] and has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] unit.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT], have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Asvaka[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Central Asia from 30 to 220 AD.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Anti-Tanks[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept aircraft, have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Armored Units[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ambush[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] can carry one [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scout[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionary[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spy[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT], has an attack bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] unit, can see the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] units, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ice[COLOR_REVERT], can explore rival territory, can withdraw from combat and are invisible to all units except the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Airship[COLOR_REVERT] units.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axemen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT]

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jaguar[COLOR_REVERT], the Aztec replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bronze Working[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Iron Working[COLOR_REVERT] technology, is cheaper, doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woodsman I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Asharittu Bowman[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT], causes collateral damage when attacking enemy units and is cheaper.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Battleships[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard city defenses and causes collateral damage.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bears[COLOR_REVERT] are Barbarian units that spawn in Siberia from 3000 to 850 BC.
[ICON_BULLET]Can Destroy Tile Improvements[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can Bomb City Defenses (-%d1_Mod%%/Turn)

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Puede cañonear las defensas de las ciudades (-%d1_Mod%%/turno)

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombards[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT], have a combat bonus when attacking cities and can bombard city defenses.
[ICON_BULLET]Can Strike Enemy Units (-19%/Turn)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Maximum 50% damage to enemy on attack

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombers[COLOR_REVERT] can destroy improvements, lower city defenses, perform recon missions, damage enemy units, cause collateral damage and have a combat penalty against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Water Units[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Create Production and Gold when Removing Jungles and Forests

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Madeireiro[COLOR_REVERT], the Brazilian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Worker[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woodsman II[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and provides extra gold and production when it chops jungles and forests.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Buddhist Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).

TEXT.Italian: Costruisce il %d1_Change%% più rapidamente con il [LINK=literal]%s2_Bonus[\LINK]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cataphract[COLOR_REVERT], the Byzantine replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Machinery[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Guilds[COLOR_REVERT] technology, has one less strength point, isn't immune to first strikes and has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut rejoindre une ville en tant que :[SPACE]
[ICON_BULLET]Peut se déplacer sur des terrains infranchissables.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can remove non-state religions and associated buildings

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Ne peut pas capturer de villes ou d'unités ennemies.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann keine feindlichen Städte oder Einheiten erobern
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Non può conquistare città o unità nemiche
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No es posible capturar ciudades o unidades enemigas

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] can explore rival territory and carry one [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scout[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionary[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spy[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Numidian Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in the Sahara from 210 BC to 900 AD.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]African War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT], the Phoenician replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Monarchy[COLOR_REVERT] technology and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shock[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapults[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catholic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat, has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] units and has a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchet[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] units.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Warband[COLOR_REVERT], the Celtic replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], requires an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] resource and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariots[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat and have an attack bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axeman[COLOR_REVERT] units.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cho Ko Nu[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowman[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Metal Casting[COLOR_REVERT] technology, has an extra first strike, causes collateral damage and has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cidainh[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit roaming in Gaul.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%% a la fuerza de la ciudad

TEXT.French: Immunité contre les dégâts collatéraux des [LINK=literal]%s1_units[\LINK]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Albion Legion[COLOR_REVERT], the Colombian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadier[COLOR_REVERT], has an additional movement point, begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City Raider I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Dégâts de %d1%% maximum infligés à l'ennemi lors d'une attaque
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Al massimo %d1%% di danni al nemico per attacco
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Daño máximo de %d1%% al enemigo en ataque

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Confucian Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Corvette[COLOR_REVERT], the Canadian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, has four less strength points, has two additional movement points, loses the ability to bombard cities and starts with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sentry[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowmen[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassiers[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat and has a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchet[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] units.

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Nimmt als Erstes die Verteidigung gegen folgende Einheiten auf: %s1_unit_list

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%% en défense sur des cases de %s2_TerrOrFeat

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT] can see the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] units, intercept air units and bombard city defenses.

TEXT.Italian: Il bonus [LINK=literal]%s1_Bonus[\LINK] raddoppia la velocità di produzione
TEXT.Spanish: Dobla la velocidad de producción con [LINK=literal]%s1_Bonus[\LINK]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Chariot[COLOR_REVERT], the Egyptian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT], has an additional strength point, is immune to first strikes and has double movement in Desert.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Redcoat[COLOR_REVERT], the English replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT], causes collateral damage.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Peut échapper à la capture (la chance de %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Puede escapar la captura (la ocasión del %d1_Amount%%)

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut infiltrer la ville d'un autre joueur (%D1_Change[ICON_ESPIONAGE])
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann die Stadt eines anderen Spielers infiltrieren (%D1_Change[ICON_ESPIONAGE])
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Può infiltrarsi nella città di un altro giocatore (%D1_Change[ICON_ESPIONAGE])
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Se puede infiltrar en la ciudad de otro jugador (%D1_Change [ICON_ESPIONAGE])

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Askari[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT], is immune to first strikes, has 1 first strike and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill I[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill II[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut échapper à une interception (%d1_Amount%% de chance)
[ICON_BULLET] Peut éluder la détection ennemie (la chance de %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] Può eludere la rilevazione nemica (probabilità di %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Puede evadir la detección enemiga (la ocasión del %d1_Amount%%)

TEXT.English: Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Corporate Executives[COLOR_REVERT] to spread the Corporation of your choice throughout the world and increase the wealth its Corporate Headquarters provides.
TEXT.French: Utilisez les [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]directeurs de sociétés commerciales[COLOR_REVERT] pour implanter la société commerciale de votre choix à travers le monde et augmenter la richesse générée par son siège.
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Unternehmensvorstand[COLOR_REVERT] gewährleistet, dass die gewünschte Kapitalgesellschaft weltweit tätig wird, und erhöht zudem das Vermögen des Unternehmenssitzes.
TEXT.Italian: Usa i [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Funzionari corporativi[COLOR_REVERT] per diffondere la corporazione di tua scelta in tutto il mondo e aumentare la ricchezza fornita dal relativo Quartier generale corporativo.
TEXT.Spanish: Usa a los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ejecutivos[COLOR_REVERT] para ampliar la corporación que quieras por el mundo y aumentar la riqueza que proporcione su sede.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorers[COLOR_REVERT] is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], gain only positive bonuses from Tribal villages, can only defend, ignores terrain movement costs and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woodsman I[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Ayuda a desenmascarar a los espías rivales

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Farari[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in the Sahara from 450 to 1700 AD.
[ICON_BULLET]Can Strike Enemy Units (-17%/Turn)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Maximum 50% damage to enemy on attack
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fighters[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept enemy air units, destroy improvements, bomb city defenses, perform recon missions and damage enemy units.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Culverin[COLOR_REVERT], the French replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT].
This early gunpowder combat unit (the French replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT]) is faster than other non-mounted units at this stage of the game.
TEXT.French: Cette unité équipée d'une arme à feu (l'unité française qui vient remplacer l'[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT]) est plus rapide que les autres unités à pied à cette étape du jeu.
TEXT.German: Diese frühe Schießpulver-Einheit (die französische Version des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketiers[COLOR_REVERT]) ist schneller als alle anderen Infanterieeinheiten in dieser Phase des Spiels.
TEXT.Italian: Questa antica unità con armi da fuoco (l'equivalente francese del [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Soldato con moschetto[COLOR_REVERT]) è più veloce delle altre unità non montate, in questa fase del gioco.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta unidad temprana con armas de pólvora (que reemplaza al soldado con [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mosquete[COLOR_REVERT] en la civilización francesa) es más rápida que otras unidades no montadas en esta fase del juego.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleys[COLOR_REVERT] have two cargo spaces, cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT] and cannot pass [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capes[COLOR_REVERT] until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Panzer[COLOR_REVERT], the Prussian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tank[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] units.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and can create a great work which generates 800 culture per game era.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineers[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and can hurry production in a city.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Generals[COLOR_REVERT] can settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Military Instructor[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] building and can attach itself to a unit which gives 20 experience and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lead by Warlord[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to the unit.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchants[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can explore rival territory and can conduct a trade mission.

[TAB]Time and again through history, there have arisen men and women who have profoundly changed the world around them - artists, scientists, prophets and others whose genius sets them head and shoulders above the rest.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophets[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and can construct [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Church of the Holy Sepulchre[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Masjid al-Haram[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mahabodhi[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kashi Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kong Lin[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dai Miao[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Adur Farnbag[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientists[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT] building.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spies[COLOR_REVERT] can settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Interpol Bureau[COLOR_REVERT] National Wonder, is invisible to all units, can explore rival territory and can infiltrate another player's city.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesmen[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, reform the government, resolve a crisis, perform a diplomatic mission, explore rival territory, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative Center[COLOR_REVERT] building.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hoplite[COLOR_REVERT], the Greek replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axeman[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shock[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Formation[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadiers[COLOR_REVERT] have a attack bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] units.
[ICON_BULLET]Can Strike Enemy Units (-30%/Turn)[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Is Destroyed after Use[COLOR_REVERT]
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Guided Missiles[COLOR_REVERT] are immune to interception, can destroy improvements, bomb city defenses and damage enemy units.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunships[COLOR_REVERT] are able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], cannot capture cities, cannot capture units, don't receive defensive bonuses, ignore terrain movement costs, can withdraw from combat, have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Armored Units[COLOR_REVERT], have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Builder[COLOR_REVERT], the Harappan replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Settler[COLOR_REVERT], can found new cities that start with additional population.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hindu Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Landsknecht[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikeman[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archers[COLOR_REVERT] are immune to first strikes, don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat, have an attack bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT] units and have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchet[COLOR_REVERT] units.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Huluganni[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Asia Minor from 2000 to 800 BC.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT] can nuke enemy lands and cannot be moved from the city it is constructed in.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Ignore les pénalités de mouvement du terrain
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Ignora i costi di movimento sul terreno
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No le afectan los costes de movimiento por terreno

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can build [LINK=ROUTE_ROAD]Road[\LINK], [LINK=ROUTE_RAILROAD]Railroad[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FARM]Farm[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_MINE]Mine[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_WORKSHOP]Workshop[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_LUMBERMILL]Lumbermill[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_WINDMILL]Windmill[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_WATERMILL]Watermill[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_PLANTATION]Plantation[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_QUARRY]Quarry[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_PASTURE]Pasture[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_CAMP]Camp[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_WELL]Well[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_WINERY]Winery[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_COTTAGE]Cottage[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FORT]Fort[\LINK], preserve [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FOREST_PRESERVE]Forest[\LINK], chop [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST]Forest[\LINK], scrub [LINK=FEATURE_FALLOUT]Fallout[\LINK], remove [LINK=FEATURE_JUNGLE]Jungle[\LINK], remove [LINK=FEATURE_RAINFOREST]Rainforest[\LINK]

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aucac[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axeman[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mining[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bronze Working[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resources, has a combat bonus against [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Archery Units[COLOR_REVERT], is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Combat I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Patiyodha[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Monarchy[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Calendar[COLOR_REVERT] technologies, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT] technology, has one less strength point, is cheaper, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Formation[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woodsman I[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Punjabi Worker[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Worker[COLOR_REVERT], is faster.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Orang Laut[COLOR_REVERT], the Indonesian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Science[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT] technologies, has two less strength points, is cheaper, has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] unit and cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capes[COLOR_REVERT] until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] are the basic [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Unit[COLOR_REVERT] of the Modern Era.
Each Unit in Play Increases Base Cost by %d1%%
TEXT.French: Chaque unité en jeu augmente le coût de base de %d1%%
TEXT.German: Für jede Einheit im Spiel steigen die Basiskosten um %d1%%
TEXT.Italian: Ogni unità in gioco aumenta il costo base di %d1%%
TEXT.Spanish: Cada unidad en juego aumenta el coste base en un %d1%%

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET] Peut arrêter les espions ennemis (la chance de %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET] Può intercettare le spie nemiche (probabilità di %d1_Amount%%)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET] Puede interceptar a los espías enemigos (la ocasión del %d1_Amount%%)
[ICON_BULLET]Invisible para la mayoría de las unidades

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Invisible to all units except [LINK=UNIT_DESTROYER]Destroyers[\LINK], [LINK=UNIT_STEALTH_DESTROYER]Stealth Destroyers[\LINK], [LINK=UNIT_SUBMARINE]Submarines[\LINK], [LINK=UNIT_ATTACK_SUBMARINE]Attack Submarines[\LINK] and [LINK=UNIT_AIRSHIP]Airships[\LINK]

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Qizilbash[COLOR_REVERT], the Iranian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ironclads[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard city defenses and cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Can perform Espionage Missions in an opponent's territory. The longer the unit is stationary the lower the cost to perform a Mission
TEXT.French: ICON_BULLET]Peut exécuter des missions d'espionnage en territoire ennemi. Le coût d'exécution des missions décroît en fonction du temps de déploiement de votre unité.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann Spionagemissionen in feindlichem Territorium ausführen. Je länger sich die Einheit am selben Ort befindet, umso weniger kostet die Ausführung einer Mission
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Può effettuare missioni di spionaggio nei territori nemici. Più l'unità è stazionaria, minore è il costo per portare a termine la missione.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Puede llevar a cabo misiones de espionaje en el territorio de un oponente. Cuanto más tiempo permanezca quieta la unidad, menor será el coste de realizar la misión.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Islamic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bersagliere[COLOR_REVERT], the Italian replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infantry[COLOR_REVERT], has an additional movement point.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Samurai[COLOR_REVERT], the Japanese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and cannot be built with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] resource.
[ICON_BULLET]Can Strike Enemy Units (-23%/Turn)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Maximum 50% damage to enemy on attack
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jet Fighters[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept enemy air units, destroy improvements, bomb city defenses, perform recon missions and damage enemy units.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ballista Elephant[COLOR_REVERT], the Khmer replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT], will attack [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] in a stack before other units in combat outside of cities and loses its combat penalty when attacking cities.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT] are immune to first strikes, don't receive defensive bonuses and have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchet[COLOR_REVERT] units.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pombos[COLOR_REVERT], the Congolese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT] and doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resources.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hwacha[COLOR_REVERT], the Korean replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT].
[ICON_BULLET]Can Provide %d1_Num Experience to Units in the Same Tile and the [LINK=PROMOTION_LEADER]Lead by Warlord[\LINK] promotion to the selected unit
[ICON_BULLET]Can Provide up to %d1 XP to Each Unit in the Same Tile and the [LINK=PROMOTION_LEADER]Lead by Warlord[\LINK] promotion to the selected unit
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lions[COLOR_REVERT] are Barbarian units that spawn in Africa from 3000 to 850 BC.

Italian.Text: Arciere con arco lungo:Arcieri con arco lungo

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Longbowmen[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike, have a defensive bonus in cities and have a defensive bonus in hills.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Guns[COLOR_REVERT] can only defend, have one first strike, can intercept aircraft, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Skirmisher[COLOR_REVERT], the Mali replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT], has an additional strength point, has a possible extra first strike and is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Marines[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Gun[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] units, are able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Holkan[COLOR_REVERT], the Mayan replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Hunting[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Archery[COLOR_REVERT] technology, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT], provides food to the nearest city when it wins a fight and can withdraw from combat.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mechanized Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept aircraft and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Medjay[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Egypt from 800 BC to 1300 AD.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rurales[COLOR_REVERT], the Mexican replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Combat I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile Cruiser[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard city defenses, causes collateral damage and can carry four [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile Units[COLOR_REVERT].

Spanish.Text: Pieza de artillería autopropulsada:Piezas de artillería autopropulsada

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mobile Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT], have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mobile SAMs[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept aircraft and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Helicopter Units[COLOR_REVERT].

Spanish.Text: Tanque de combate principal:Tanques de combate principal

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Main Battle Tanks[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike, don't receive defensive bonuses and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Blitz[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mohawk[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Western North America from 1500 to 1850 AD.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Keshik[COLOR_REVERT], the Mongol replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Guilds[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource, has an additional movement point, causes collateral damage and has a first strike.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Corsair[COLOR_REVERT], the Moorish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Gunpowder[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT] technologies, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Science[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT] technologies, has one less movement point, has two less strength points, is cheaper, has a combat bonus on [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coast[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] unit and provides some gold when sinking enemy ships.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Brave[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Central North America from 1700 to 1900 AD.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Elephant[COLOR_REVERT], the Mughal replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT] resource, cannot be built with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] resource and has a combat bonus when attacking cities.
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dog Soldier[COLOR_REVERT] is a Barbarian unit that spawns in Central North America and the Andes Mountains from 600 - 1800 AD.

Spanish.Text: Navío de las Indias Orientales:Navíos de las Indias Orientales

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]East Indianman[COLOR_REVERT], the Dutch replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleon[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional strength points, has an additional cargo space and can explore rival territory.
Use this missionary to actively spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hellenism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.French: Utilisez ce missionnaire pour propager l'[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]hellénisme[COLOR_REVERT] dans les villes alliées (ou les villes rivales avec lesquelles vous avez un accord de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]libre passage[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.German: Setzen Sie diesen Missionar ein, um in verbündeten oder feindlichen Städten (mit [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]offenen Grenzen[COLOR_REVERT]) den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hellenismus[COLOR_REVERT] zu verbreiten.
TEXT.Italian: Usa questo missionario per diffondere attivamente l' [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ellenismo[COLOR_REVERT] nelle città amiche (o nelle città rivali con le quali si ha [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]diritto di passaggio[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Spanish: Este misionero sirve para propagar el [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Helenismo[COLOR_REVERT] por ciudades amigas (o de civilizaciones rivales con las que se tenga una [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Apertura de fronteras[COLOR_REVERT]).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Orthodox Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Janissary[COLOR_REVERT], the Ottoman replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archery Units[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Leopards[COLOR_REVERT] are Barbarian units that spawn in Africa from 3000 to 850 BC.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Paratroopers[COLOR_REVERT] can evade interception and can perform paradrops.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Immortal[COLOR_REVERT], the Persian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT], has an attack bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archers[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Religious Persecutors[COLOR_REVERT] can remove non-state religions from a city.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikemen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Winged Hussar[COLOR_REVERT], the Polish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassier[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] units.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Waka[COLOR_REVERT], the Polynesian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galley[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional movement points, is cheaper, has one less cargo space and can create [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carrack[COLOR_REVERT], the Portuguese replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravel[COLOR_REVERT], can transport any unit, has an additional cargo space and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sentry[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateers[COLOR_REVERT] has hidden nationality can attack enemy units without declaring war and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sentry[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Protestant Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Riflemen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Legion[COLOR_REVERT], the Roman replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional strength points, is more expensive, loses the attack bonus when attacking cities, has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axeman[COLOR_REVERT] unit, can construct [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roman Roads[COLOR_REVERT] and can be trained until the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Chemistry[COLOR_REVERT] technologies have been discovered.
Use this missionary to actively spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religion[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.French: Utilisez ce missionnaire pour propager la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]religion[COLOR_REVERT] dans les villes alliées (ou les villes rivales avec lesquelles vous avez un accord de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]libre passage[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.German: Setzen Sie diesen Missionar ein, um in verbündeten oder feindlichen Städten (mit [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]offenen Grenzen[COLOR_REVERT]) die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religion[COLOR_REVERT] zu verbreiten.
TEXT.Italian: Usa questo missionario per diffondere attivamente la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religione[COLOR_REVERT] nelle città amiche (o nelle città rivali con le quali si ha [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]diritto di passaggio[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Spanish: Este misionero sirve para propagar la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religión[COLOR_REVERT] por ciudades amigas (o de civilizaciones rivales con las que se tenga una [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Apertura de fronteras[COLOR_REVERT]).

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cossack[COLOR_REVERT], the Russian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT].

Italian.Text: Fanteria con missili terra-aria:Fanterie con missili terra-aria

Spanish.Text: Infantería con misiles tierra-aire:Infanterías con misiles tierra-aire

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]SAM Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept aircraft and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Helicopter Units[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scouts[COLOR_REVERT] is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], gain only positive bonuses from Tribal villages, can only defend and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Animal Units[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ghulam Warrior[COLOR_REVERT], the Seljuk replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Guilds[COLOR_REVERT] technology, has one less strength point, doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource, can withdraw from combat, has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikeman[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units and cannot be upgraded.
[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only be built on your capital's continent until the discovery of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=TECH_ASTRONOMY]Astronomy[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]

Italian.Text: Nave da prima linea:Navi da prima linea

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ship of the Lines[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard city defenses and have a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frigate[COLOR_REVERT] units.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Slaves[COLOR_REVERT] can create [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slave Plantations[COLOR_REVERT] and can settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slave[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Conquistador[COLOR_REVERT], the Spanish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassier[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT] technology, receives a defensive bonus, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT] except for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikeman[COLOR_REVERT] unit and can be trained until the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Advanced Flight[COLOR_REVERT] technology has been discovered.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearmen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spies[COLOR_REVERT] are invisible to all units, can explore rival territory, help thwart rival spies and can perform espionage missions.
[ICON_BULLET]Can Strike Enemy Units (-21%/Turn)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Maximum 50% damage to enemy on attack

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Bombers[COLOR_REVERT] can destroy improvements, bomb city defenses, perform recon missions, damage enemy units, have an increased chance to evade interception, causes collateral damage and has a combat malus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Water Units[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT] are invisible to all units to all units except [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT], have two first strikes, can bombard city defenses and can see the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT] units.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] can carry three [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile Units[COLOR_REVERT], see the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] units, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ice[COLOR_REVERT], can explore rival territory, can withdraw from combat and are invisible to all units except [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarines[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Airships[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Vulture[COLOR_REVERT] is a Barbarian unit that spawns in the Middle East from 1600 BC to 300 AD.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT] have a attack bonus when attacking cities.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tactical Nukes[COLOR_REVERT] have an increased chance to evade interception and can nuke enemy lands.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dharani[COLOR_REVERT], the Tamil replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravel[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT] technology, has an additional strength point, has one less movement point, cannot enter the ocean until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT], cannot pass capes until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT], has two first strikes, can transport military units and has an additional cargo space.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tanks[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Blitz[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taoist Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
[ICON_BULLET]Targets any %s1_unit_list first in combat outside cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Permet de viser en premier toute unité %s1_unit_list au combat en dehors des villes.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Greift in Gefechten außerhalb von Städten als Erstes folgende Einheiten an: %s1_unit_list
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Prende di mira per prime le unità %s1_unit_list nei combattimenti all'esterno delle città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Convierte en objetivo prioritario a %s1_unit_list en los combates fuera de las ciudades.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chang Suek[COLOR_REVERT], the Thai replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horse[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resources, requires the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT] resource, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] and receives an offensive bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] units.

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Khampa[COLOR_REVERT], the Tibetan replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT], is more expensive, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Archery[COLOR_REVERT], is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT], can explore rival territory and has an attack bonus when attacking cities.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchets[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT], have a attack bonus when attacking cities and can bombard city defenses.

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Triremes[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galley[COLOR_REVERT] unit, cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT] and cannot pass [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capes[COLOR_REVERT] until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Huscarl[COLOR_REVERT], the Viking replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] and has an attack bonus when attacking cities.
[ICON_BULLET]Unit may not reveal undiscovered terrain except inside a player's territory
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]L'unité ne peut révéler des cases terrain qu'à l'intérieur du territoire du joueur
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Einheit darf unentdecktes Gelände nicht erkunden, außer innerhalb des Territoriums eines Spielers
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]L'unità non può rivelare terreni inesplorati se non nel territorio del giocatore
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]La unidad no puede revelar terreno oculto excepto en el territorio del jugador

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephants[COLOR_REVERT] are able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT], don't receive defensive bonuses, have a combat penalty when attacking cities and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Warriors[COLOR_REVERT] have a defensive bonus in cities.
[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wolves[COLOR_REVERT] are Barbarian units that spawn in Siberia from 3000 to 850 BC.

[ICON_BULLET]Can create [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_FISHING_BOATS]Fishing Boats[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_HIGH_SEA_FISHING_BOATS]High Sea Fishing Boats[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_WHALING_BOATS]Whaling Boats[\LINK], [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_OFFSHORE_PLATFORM]Offshore Platform[\LINK]

[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Work Boats[COLOR_REVERT] can create [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]High Sea Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whaling boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Offshore Platforms[COLOR_REVERT], cannot enter the ocean until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT] and cannot pass capes until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]I lavoratori realizzano i miglioramenti il %D1_Change%% più rapidamente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Los trabajadores construyen mejoras un %D1_Change%% más rápido

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zoroastrian Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Impi[COLOR_REVERT] is a Barbarian unit that spawns in the Sahara and in Sub-Equatorial Africa from 450 to 1700 AD.

Italian.Text: Unità con armi da fuoco:Unità con armi da fuoco

Spanish.Text: U. armas de pólvora:U. armas de pólvora

Italian.Text: Unità da combattimento ravvicinato:Unità da combattimento ravvicinato

Spanish.Text: U. cuerpo a cuerpo:U. cuerpo a cuerpo
